sentences.sContent: Comparing former films and modern high-tech films, which kind do you like better and why?
sentences.sContent_eng: Comparing former films and modern high-tech films, which kind do you like better and why?
sentences.sCn: 对比以前的电影与现在的高科技电影，您更倾向于哪一类?为什么?。

sentences.sContent: But the high-tech Haiti volunteer response also depended in large part on personal connections, and the mobilization of the Haitian diaspora in North America, for it to work.
sentences.sContent_eng: But the high-tech Haiti volunteer response also depended in large part on personal connections, and the mobilization of the Haitian diaspora in North America, for it to work.
sentences.sCn: 不过这些使用高科技的志愿者的灵敏度，很大程度上还依赖于他们个人的人际关系，以及对侨居在北美的海地居民的动员。

sentences.sContent: Boyun micro intelligent, high-tech intelligent life experience! No matter when and where, you can control appliance and video surveillance through software, do wireless life, enjoy unlimited!
sentences.sContent_eng: Boyun micro intelligent, high-tech intelligent life experience! No matter when and where, you can control appliance and video surveillance through software, do wireless life, enjoy unlimited!
sentences.sCn: 博云微智能，体验高科技智能生活！无论何时何地，您都可以通过软件控制家电和视频监控，做到无线生活，无限享受！

synos.tran: 高科技的，高技术的；仿真技术的

remMethod.val: high(高的) + tech(科技) → 高科技
